text: Ate asim hareka umata (visesa kala da inasani samaja) vicom ika rasula bheji'a hai ki alaha di hi ibadata karom ate taguta (saitana) tom bacom. Tam unham vicom kujha ku nu alaha ne caga raha bakhasi'a ate kise upara gumarahi sidha ho ke rahi. Isa la'i dharati upara ghuma phira ke dekho ki inakara karana vali'am da ki hala ho'i'a
